addNewBountyPool(address,address,string,.details: Can only be called by the owner.

params._projectName: Name of the project that is hosting the bounty
params._projectWallet: Address that will be able to deposit funds, set APY and poolCap for the pool
params._referralEndTime: Timestamp up until the referral will be active
params._referralFee: Referral fee that the referrer will receive (in BPS), max 50%
params._referrer: Address of the individual that referred this bounty to The Saloon
params._token: Token to be used by bounty pool

params._pid: The pool id for the bounty

params._saloonWallet: Address where the funds will go to

params._token: Token used by the bounty that was referred

params._saloonWallet: Address where the funds will go to

params._pid: Pool id whose strategy should be compounded

params._endTime: The new end time for the referral bonus
params._pid: The pool id for the bounty

finalizeConsolidation(uint256,uint256).details: Called at the end of bountyToken.consolidate(), also deletes list of unstakedTokens

params._memX: Total calculated pool xDelta following call to consolidate()

params._xDelta: xDelta to add to pool (scaled to bounty measurements)

params._strategyName: Name of the strategy where deposit will go to

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

payBounty(uint256,address,uint16,uint16).details: only callable by Saloon ownerIncludes Saloon commission + hunter payout

params._hunter: Hunter address that will receive payout
params._payoutBPS: Percentage of Saloon's fee that will go to hunter as bonus

params._amount: Amount to withdraw (must be equal to amount scheduled)

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

receiveStrategyYield(address,uint256).details: Anyone can call this but will result in lost funds for non-strategies. TODO ADD MODIFIER TO THIS? - Tokens are transferred from msg.sender to this contract and saloonStrategyProfit and/or   referralBalances are incremented.

scheduleProjectDepositWithdrawal(uint256.details: withdrawal must be made within a certain time window

scheduleUnstake(uint256).details: must be unstaked within a certain time window after scheduled

params._tokenId: Token Id of ERC721 being unstaked

setAPYandPoolCapAndDeposit(uint256,uint2.details: Can only be called by the projectWallet

params._apy: Average APY that will be paid to stakers
params._deposit: Amount to be deopsited as bounty payout
params._poolCap: Max size of pool in token amount
params._strategyName: Name of the strategy to be used

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._shouldHarvest: Whether staker wants to claim their owed premium or not
params._tokenId: Token Id of ERC721 being unstaked

updateCurrentX(uint256,uint256).details: reflects the new value of X in relation to change in pool size

updateTokenWhitelist(address,bool,uint25.details: Only one token is allowed per pool

params._minStakeAmount: The minimum amount for staking for pools pools using such token
params._token: ERC20 to add or remove from whitelist
params._whitelisted: bool to select if a token will be added or removed

upgradeTo(address).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

billPremium(uint256).notice: Bill premiums for a single pool.

collectAllReferralProfits().notice: Allows referrers to collect their profit from all bounties for all tokens

collectAllSaloonProfits(address).notice: Transfer Saloon profits for all tokens from premiums and bounties collected

collectReferralProfit(address).notice: Allows referrers to collect their profit from all bounties for one token

collectSaloonProfits(address,address).notice: Transfer Saloon profits for a specific token from premiums and bounties collected

compoundYieldForAll().notice: Harvest pending yield from active strategy for all pids and reinvest

compoundYieldForPid(uint256).notice: Harvest pending yield from active strategy for single pid and reinvest

extendReferralPeriod(uint256,uint256).notice: Extend the referral period for the bounty. The new end time can only be larger than the current value.

makeProjectDeposit(uint256,uint256,strin.notice: Makes a deposit that will serve as bounty payout

payBounty(uint256,address,uint16,uint16).notice: Pays valid bounty submission to hunter

receiveStrategyYield(address,uint256).notice: Callback function from strategies upon converting yield to underlying

scheduleProjectDepositWithdrawal(uint256.notice: Schedules withdrawal for a project deposit

setAPYandPoolCapAndDeposit(uint256,uint2.notice: Sets the average APY,Pool Cap and deposits project payout

stake(uint256,uint256).notice: Stake tokens in a Bounty pool to earn premium payments.

updateProjectWalletAddress(uint256,addre.notice: Updates the pool's project wallet address

updateTokenWhitelist(address,bool,uint25.notice: Updates the list of ERC20 tokens allow to be used in bounty pools_minStakeAmount must either be set on first whitelisting for token, or must be un-whitelisted and then re-whitelisted to reset value

viewCurrentAPY(uint256).notice: Gets Current APY of pool (y-value) scaled to target APY
